snippet: Frustrated by the relatively sparse coverage of recent demonstrations in the Turkish media, supporters of the protest movement have turned to social networks to share images of police officers using force.
abstract: Frustrated by the relatively sparse coverage of recent demonstrations in the Turkish media, supporters of the protest movement have turned to social networks to share images of police officers using force.

headline.main: Add Tear Gas and Stir: Images of Police Brutality Fuel Anger in Turkey
